    Gaurav Neupane

    Texas, United States

    Summary

    Software Engineer with a strong background in backend development, cloud computing, and AI, specializing in scalable and high-performance applications across gaming, FinTech, and AI industries. Skilled in Java, Spring Boot, Python and AWS, with extensive experience in Microservices architecture, serverless deployments, and DevOps practices like Docker, Kubernetes and CI/CD. Proven ability to design optimized search solutions with Apache Solr, develop real-time backend systems for multiplayer gaming and B2B and deploy machine learning models in the cloud environments.

    Experience

    Yarsa Labs | Pokhara, Nepal Back-End Engineer (Java Focus) 2022-2023

    Game Servers

    • Designed and deployed scalable game servers using AWS services like EC2 for compute resources, Elastic Load Balancing for distributing traffic, S3 for storage, RDS for database solutions, and Lambda for serverless functions, ensuring high availability and efficient server management for real-time gaming environments.
    • Optimized Redis caching mechanisms to enhance data retrieval speed and reduce latency, improving overall application performance by 20%.
    • Implemented MongoDB aggregation pipelines to handle race conditions efficiently, ensuring data consistency and reliability in concurrent processing scenarios.
    • Implemented Prometheus and Grafana to monitor user behavior and track game server performance, enabling real-time insights, alerting, and data visualization for proactive issue resolution and performance optimization.
    • Collaborated in the development of a generic API Server using Java, Spring, and AWS, designed to handle and store non-real-time game data, ensuring efficient backend support and seamless integration across various gaming platforms.
    • Contributed to the creation of a Game Server for real-time game applications, leveraging Java, Spring, and AWS to deliver low-latency performance and scalable infrastructure, enabling smooth and responsive gameplay experiences.

    Matchmaking Microservice

    • Led the optimization of the matchmaking system for games with 100M+ downloads, improving algorithm efficiency and reducing matchmaking time, resulting in enhanced user experience and increased player engagement.
    • Utilized Java, Spring, Docker, Microservices, AWS and Kubernetes to optimize the matchmaking system, enabling scalable and containerized solutions for efficient matchmaking processes, enhancing performance, and ensuring reliable deployment across cloud environments.

    B2B Application

    • Enhanced search engine performance by configuring Apache Solr for optimized indexing and relevancy tuning, improving search results accuracy by 25%.
    • Provided 100% test coverage for a B2B application, ensuring robust functionality and seamless integration by developing comprehensive unit and integration tests, leading to increased reliability and minimized production issues.
    • Implemented Authentication and Authorization mechanisms using AWS Cognito to ensure secure access control and user management in the application.
    • Integrated AWS S3 with Lambda triggers for efficient object storage and automated file handling, reducing storage management overhead by 30%.
    • Designed and implemented microservices architecture with Spring Eureka, Netflix, Apache Kafka, and Spring Ribbon, ensuring modularity, client-side load balancing, and fault tolerance.
    • Automated CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins to streamline deployment processes, ensuring consistent and reliable delivery of updates across environments.

    Bottle Technology | Kathmandu, Nepal Associate Back-End Engineer 2021-2022

    Trading Application

    • Developed backend APIs for a real-time trading application that enabled users to trade online securely, utilizing Java, Spring, and AWS for high-performance RESTful services and payment gateway integration.
    • Architected the application with microservices to ensure scalability and fault tolerance, implementing service discovery (Spring Eureka), fault handling (Hystrix, Resilience4J), and asynchronous messaging (Kafka).
    • Integrated PostgreSQL and MongoDB for managing transactional and non-transactional data, optimizing data storage and retrieval for real-time trading operations. Used Spring Data JPA for PostgreSQL and Spring Data MongoDB for MongoDB integration.
    • Optimized data retrieval performance by integrating Redis caching, reducing latency by 40% for high-frequency trading data.
    • Leveraged AWS services including Route 53 for DNS management, Lambda for serverless functions, EC2 for scalable compute, CloudWatch for monitoring, and RDS for database management, ensuring high availability and security.
    • Developed an automated web scraping application using Java and Selenium to extract data from various government websites, streamlining data collection processes and enhancing operational efficiency.
    • Implemented Spring Transactions and designed Session Beans to handle business logic at the middle tier, ensuring robust transaction management and optimizing application performance.

    Inspiring Lab | Kathmandu, Nepal Software Developer(Backend Focus) 2019-2021

    Vehicle Surveillance system

    • Built and deployed a real-time vehicle surveillance system using Java, Spring WebSocket, and AWS, enabling continuous data streaming and live monitoring for enhanced security and operational efficiency.
    • Leveraged Hibernate ORM for seamless object-relational mapping (ORM) to persist and retrieve data, ensuring high data integrity and optimized database queries.
    • Employed Spring JDBC and DAO patterns to simplify database interactions, enhance code maintainability, and streamline transaction management for improved performance and reliability.
    • Collaborated with AI developers to design and implement training pipelines and deploy TensorFlow and OpenCV-based AI detectors in the AWS cloud, ensuring scalable and efficient model deployment.

    Auto Dataset creator platform

    • Developed ETL pipelines to process live camera images, run AI model predictions, and store detection results, automating data collection to support dataset creators and increase operational efficiency, ultimately saving company resources.
    • Utilized AWS services such as Amazon S3 for image storage, AWS EC2 with High GPUS for running AI predictions and Amazon RDS for storing and managing detected data, ensuring scalable, cost-effective, and high-performance operations.

    Pollen Detector System

    • Leveraged AWS services to migrate the legacy system to a cloud-native architecture, following 12-factor app principles for improved scalability, flexibility, and maintainability in the cloud.
    • Integrated a computer vision-based application using Java and Python to detect pollen in real-time, successfully incorporating it into the legacy system for enhanced data processing and analysis, ultimately helping to save lives by providing timely pollen detection for individuals with pollen allergies.

    Yarsa Labs | Pokhara, Nepal Junior Software Developer(Backend Focus) - Contract 2017-2011

    Game Servers Backend

    • Collaborated in the development of a backend architecture for real-time multiplayer games, ensuring seamless data synchronization and low-latency performance.
    • Supported the development team by implementing core game features, optimizing performance, and troubleshooting critical issues to enhance the overall gaming experience.
    • Committed to continuous learning and professional development, staying current with emerging technologies and best practices in software development to drive innovation.
    • Leveraged Hibernate ORM for efficient data persistence and retrieval, ensuring high data integrity, optimized database queries, and streamlined interactions between the game backend and relational databases.
    • Implemented an email notification system using JMS API, enhancing communication efficiency within the application by enabling reliable and asynchronous messaging.
